Translations.Text: Prout pro fortunate unus they est Paradise. Eternally they abide therein prout long prout caelum terra endure prout testimentum tuus Dominus - everlasting reward
Non habet any doubt regarding quod these people worship they worship exactly prout they invenit their parentes worshipping Nos requite them their due share fully reduction
Nos dedit Moses scripture it disputed ac it est pro predetermined word decretum tuus Dominus they scabinus statim! They est foderator de doubt de hoc suspicious
Tuus Dominus surely recompense everyone their works He est fully Cognizant de everything they perfecit
Ergo continue path vos enjoined subsequentis unus those repented vos non transgress! He est Seer de everything vos perfecit
Non lean towards those transgressed lest vos incur Hell invenit nullus allies help vos DEUS tunc finis losers
Vos observe Contact Prayers (Salat) ambo finis de feria nox. righteous works wipe malus works Hoc est reminder those take heed
Vos steadfastly persevere DEUS nunquam fails recompense the righteous

Si unus some de those among proximus generations possessed satis intelligence forbid malus! Unus ut few de them deserved saved nos! Prout pro transgressors they preoccupied their material luxuries; they est guilty
Tuus Dominus nunquam annihilates any community unjustly dum its people est righteous
(Habet tuus Dominus willed totus people est 1 congregation believers)! they semper dispute (truth)
(Unus those beatus cum mercy ex tuus Dominus non dispute truth)! Hoc why He created them. judgment tuus Dominus iam proles ego fill Hell jinns humans totus unus
Nos narrate vos satis history messengers strengthen tuus heart truth advenit vos hic alias prout enlightenments reminders believers
Dictus to those disbelieve Perfecit whatever vos potuit ac ita perfecit nos
Tunc wait nos too wait
To DEUS belongs future de caelum terra totus matters controlled Eum! Vos worship Eum trust Eum. Tuus Dominus est nunquam unaware de anything vos perfecit
Ut. L. R. These letters est proofs hoc profound scripture
Nos revealed it Arabic Quran vos understand
Nos narrate vos the multus accurate history revelation de hoc Quran. Ante hoc vos est totally unaware
Recall ut Joseph dictus to his patris O my patris ego vide 11 planets sun moon ego vide them prostrating me
He dictus My filius non tell tuus frater tuus dream lest they plot scheme vos. Surely devil est vir malus enemy
Tuus Dominus sic beatus vos dedit vos bonus news tuus dream He perfected His blessings vos familia Jacob prout He perfecit pro tuus patres Abraham Isaac ante ut. Tuus Dominus est Omniscient Wise
